title: 'Good and comfortable'
body: Writing it after a week's use. This flipflops is very comfortable like a thick sponge. Slightly loose too your feet that provides flexibility for your feet to breathe. The belts could fit more tighter. For a rough usage in your local it's a very good classy chappal. One drawback is the price for this kind of quality could be lower. More than 400rs is high. Could provide anywhere around 320-350rs would be a good value for money product.  I was more into puma ketava flipflops with hard soles instead I choose this for as its evergreen black and red combo with affordable price point. If you don't have any budget restrictions you can checkout the puma ketava and you'll thank me
